INDEX.TITLE: Your Search For Better Sleep Ends Here
INDEX.INTRODUCTION: Nyxo is the best aid for improving your sleep quality. We combine cutting edge sleep science with your sleep tracker’s data to provide you with personalized and actionable coaching that will make you sleep better.
INDEX.IMPORTING: No Need to Buy a New Sleep Tracker
INDEX.IMPORTING_TEXT: Import your data from your existing sleep tracker. If you do not own a sleep tracker, you can also use Nyxo’s built in sleep diary feature to track your sleep.
INDEX.AUTHORS: Developed Together With The Leading Sleep Researchers
INDEX.AUTHORS_TEXT: Nyxo sleep coaching program is based on the latest scientific evidence. It focuses on improving all aspects of your sleep and daily rhythm of life.
INDEX.EASE_OF_USE: Improving your sleep has never been this easy
INDEX.EASE_OF_USE_TEXT: See what four weeks of personalized sleep coaching can do for your well-being and productivity.
INDEX.DATA_TEXT: Nyxo uses your sleep data to personalize the coaching to fit your needs.
INDEX.ORGANIZATIONS_TEXT: With Nyxo for teams (coming soon), you can enroll your team or even your whole organization into the coaching program. We will help your employees to sleep better and improve both their well-being and work performance.

NEWSLETTER.TITLE: Stay tuned
NEWSLETTER.DESCRIPTION: Subscribe to our newsletter and never miss out on free sleep coaching materials, product updates and more.
NEWSLETTER.PRIVACY: Read how we handle your data

GET_THE_APP.TITLE: Get the app
GET_THE_APP.TEXT: Download the app for free and sleep better starting tonight.

FOR_YOU.TITLE: For You
FOR_YOU.DESCRIPTION: Nyxo provides personalized and interactive sleep coaching, a wide support for different sleep tracker brands, sleep diary functionality, cloud backups, and much more!
FOR_YOU.TITLE_1: Top Notch Sleep Tracking for Free
FOR_YOU.TEXT_1: Our easy and highly compatible sleep tracking and diary functionality along with your sleep metrics are completely free to use. You can easily import your sleep data from a variety of different sleep trackers, as long as they are Apple Health or Google Fit compatible. Alternatively, you can use the App as a sleep diary and manually track your nights.
FOR_YOU.TEXT_2: We combine the latest sleep research and leading behavioral techniques with your sleep data and provide you with a 4-week long personalized coaching program that is designed to help you sleep better. It focuses on all aspects of your sleep and targets areas of improvement in your daily routines and sleeping habits. Premium feature available for 4.99 € / month.
FOR_YOU.TEXT_3: Creating a Nyxo Cloud account (optional) allows you to sync and store all your data in the Nyxo Cloud. You also have an option to give other users, such as health care or insurance providers, access to your data via Nyxo Cloud. Nyxo Cloud website will be released later this year.
FOR_YOU.TEXT_4: We humans are like incredibly complex pieces of machinery that require day to day maintenance in order to function properly. Sleep is one of the few basic necessities in life. It affects our mental and physical well-being, performance, productivity, creativity and countless other things every day. Yet it is often overlooked. We help you to make the most out of the time you spend in bed.
FOR_YOU.ACCESS: Full access to the coaching materials

FOR_ORGANIZATIONS.TITLE: For Organizations
FOR_ORGANIZATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Nyxo allows knowledge workers to improve their sleep and day rhythm, allowing them to perform better at work and keep a work-life balance.
FOR_ORGANIZATIONS.SUBTITLE: What Nyxo Provides For Your Organization
FOR_ORGANIZATIONS.TEXT_1: Sleep is a key factor in both personal well-being and a balanced worklife. With Nyxo for Teams your whole organization can enjoy the benefits of Nyxo sleep coaching.
FOR_ORGANIZATIONS.TITLE_2: Unlock the Full Potential of Your Team
FOR_ORGANIZATIONS.TEXT_2: Did you know that the productivity loss caused by insufficient sleep costs hundreds of billions to the employers and the society every year? We help your organization to perform smoother and achieve your productivity goals without compromising employee well-being.
FOR_ORGANIZATIONS.TEXT_3: (Coming soon.) We highlight the main areas of improvement by providing group-level analytics and reports on how your organization is sleeping. The data are anonymized and cannot be connected to individual employees.
FOR_ORGANIZATIONS.TEXT_4: A well-rested and healthy employee is a happy and motivated employee. And happy faces set the mood for the whole working environment. Now who wouldn’t want to work in a joyful and supportive atmosphere?
FOR_ORGANIZATIONS.CONTACT: Contact us for more information on Nyxo for Teams!
FOR_ORGANIZATIONS.ACCESS: Full access to the coaching program & materials

COACHING.TITLE: Want Sleep Better? Get Nyxo Sleep Coaching Now
COACHING.SUBTITLE: The secret to good sleep is at your fingertips
COACHING.DESCRIPTION: A good night’s sleep is the key to success. It makes you feel better, think better, and makes your more productive. The question is how can one improve their sleep? Once you go to bed, there isn’t much you can do to improve your sleep quality. However, there´s a clear connection between what you do during the day and your nightly sleep quality, and this is the central thesis of our sleep coaching.
COACHING.INTRODUCTION: A good night’s sleep is the key to success. It makes you feel better, think better, and makes your more productive. The question is how can one improve their sleep? Once you go to bed, there isn’t much you can do to improve your sleep quality. However, there´s a clear connection between what you do during the day and your nightly sleep quality, and this is the central thesis of our sleep coaching.
COACHING.HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT: Nyxo Sleep Coaching is structured into four weeks, each one them focusing on a different part of good sleep. By connecting your sleep tracker to Nyxo, through the Nyxo app, we use your sleep data to personalize the coaching program to your unique needs. By examining different parts of daily activity, such as exercise, sleep, heart rate, and daily activity levels, we can bring you personalized advice in the form of lessons, practices, and facilitated habit change.
COACHING.LESSONS_TEXT: The world´s largest selection of sleep lessons
COACHING.HABITS_TEXT: Below is a small sample of habits and exercises from the Nyxo Sleep Coaching
COACHING.AUTHORS_TEXT: These are the authors behind the Nyxo materials you love. Here you can learn more about the authors, including their areas of expertise, and find all materials they've written.

BLOG.TITLE: Nyxo Blog
BLOG.DESCRIPTION: Follow the Nyxo blog for the latest tips on sleep health and well-being as well as software engineering. Be the first to hear about new product features, announcements and company updates.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.TEXT: We take the commitment to our users seriously. If you have questions on how to use Nyxo, are experiencing technical difficulties or want to know more about our products, please do not hesitate to contact us. We also encourage you to send any feedback or suggestions you might have!
CONTACT.NAME: Name
CONTACT.SUBJECT: Subject

DEVICES.TITLE: Devices
DEVICES.DESCRIPTION: The following are devices that the Nyxo application supports.

ABOUT.TITLE: We’re on a mission to make the world sleep better
ABOUT.INTRODUCTION_1: Nyxo was founded in early 2019 with a mission to help people to improve their sleep and day rhythm. Our first product is Nyxo, a personalized sleep coaching program that operates from your phone, evaluates your sleeping habits and helps you tackle the issues you might have in your sleep and daily routines.
ABOUT.INTRODUCTION_2: The roots of Nyxo are deeply rooted in scientific research, in a research commercialization project conducted at the University of Helsinki.
ABOUT.INTRODUCTION_3: Before founding Nyxo, the founders did pioneering work on startup–corporate collaboration. With these methods, the company has had the opportunity to kick-start their business and work with the leading companies in Finland in insurance and health care business.
ABOUT.SCIENTISTS_TEXT: Nyxo’s roots are deeply rooted in science and we constantly collaborate with the leading sleep researchers, in order to build the best possible products for improving sleep and well-being.
ABOUT.WORK_FOR_US_TEXT: We’re a small team but growing quickly. As an early team member, you’ll have an outsized impact on what we build and how we build it. If you’re interested, we’d love to hear from you.

PROMPT.DESKTOP: Track your sleep and get personalized sleep coaching
